definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: E. of Jordan (place of the desert, [[ישׁם]]) in Moab Ez Eze 25:9; [[הַיְשִׁמׂת]] ´[[בּ]] Nu 33:49, Jos 12:3; given to Reuben [[הַיְשִׁמוֹת]] ´[[בּ]] Jos 13:20; —perh. mod. es-Suweime, De Saulcy:Voyage i. 315 f., cf. Merrill:PE Soc. iv. 1877 Bd:Pal 172 Survey:EP i. 156.
